attributes.action: Overturn Result of EU Referendum Based on Falsified Claims Over NHS Funding
attributes.additional_details: Nigel Farge has subsequently admitted that this pledge was a mistake and should not have formed a part of their campaign.
attributes.background: During the EU referendum campaign, Vote Leave pledged the NHS would receive an additional £350m per week in funding from monies appropriated from EU funding savings. This pledge was inaccurate, yet was the cornerstone of a highly emotive EU referendum campaign.
